about_the_game:
Dive into the rollercoaster life of a struggling journalism student at Cumlombia University! Love life? Well, let's just say it's been a wild ride. But forget about all that when your snooping roommate unveils a juicy secret—Cumlombia's got more drama than a soap opera, and you're about to be the star..

Classroom crushes? Check. Dangerous secrets? Double-check. As you play detective, you'll find yourself meeting a ton of interesting characters, not just in lectures but also in the shady corners where the real action happens. "Pleasure Thieves" is your chance to juggle love, unravel mysteries, and decide the fate of the university.

"Pleasure Thieves - Special Edition" includes 4 Main Episodes:

- Episode 1: The New Boy

- Episode 2: Pompoms & Basketball

- Episode 3: Showtime!

- Episode 4: The Order

- Extra Content: Mrs. Evans & Her Daughter

One of the most acclaimed games in the adult visual novel genre for its humorous presentation, paying homage to classic sorority movies.

Experience the power of your decisions as they shape the unfolding scenes. Craft your own path and delve into diverse story branches, each unveiling irresistible moments. With a robust Achievement System, rest assured no stone is left unturned. Every choice holds weight in this game, seducing you to revisit and uncover all it has to offer.

Enter a fascinating world filled with unique characters, each possessing their own distinct personalities and stories. These intriguing characters will transport you to the realm of Pleasure Thieves, evoking the same nostalgic feeling as beloved characters from classic teen movies: the protagonist with dreams to accomplish, the chubby friend whose sole focus is getting laid, the despicable rich kid, the sexy, intelligent girl with a hidden secret, or the selfish cheerleader who only thinks about becoming more popular. And many more!

content_descriptors.notes: Explicit and frequent depictions of sexual acts, full nudity, and ejaculation. There is a raping-attempt sequence and forced sex from women to man included in this game.
